Graphic

Used for namespace and for generic function about rendering and browser

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

License

MIT-style license.

Summary
GraphicUsed for namespace and for generic function about rendering and browser
Class Methods
rendererSupportedChecks if a renderer is supported by the browser and by the framework
Matrix2D Matrix operation used for geometric transform of any shape.
Class Methods
multiplyMultiply 2 matrix
translateCreate a translation matrix
rotateCreate a rotate matrix
scaleCreate a scale matrix
rotateAtCreate a rotate matrix at a specific rotation center
scaleAtCreate a scale matrix at a specific center
invertInverts a matrix
Instance Methods
initializeConstructor.
mutliplyRightMultiply this matrix by another one to the right (this * matrix)
mutliplyLeftMultiply this matrix by another one to the left (matrix * this)
multiplyPointMultiply a point
multiplyBoundsMultiply a bound area (x, y, w, h)
valuesGets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy)
setValuesSets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy) with an array
hashValuesGets matrix values (xx, xy, yx, yy, dx, dy)
Graphic.AbstractRenderAbstract Renderer Class
initializeConstructor.
panPans current viewing.
zoomZooms current viewing.
getViewingGets current viewing.
setViewingSets current viewing.
setSizeSets current renderer size
getSizeGets current renderer size
destroyDestructor.
createShapeCreates a new shape.
addAdds a new shape to be displayed.
removeRemoves a shape from rendering
getGets a shape from an ID
shapesGets all shapes of the renderer
clearClears all shapes from rendering
updateAttributesUpdates shape attributes.
updateTransformUpdates shape transformation.
nbShapesGets nb shapes displayed in the renderer
showShows a shape.
hideHides a shape.
moveToFrontChanges shape z-index order to be display above all other shapes
moveToBackChanges shape z-index order to be display under all other shapes
drawPerforms shape rendering.
positionGets top-left renderer position
pickGets shape for a mouse event
Implemented Functions
initializeConstructor.
destroyDestructor.
getTypeGets node type ( = node name)
setIDSets shape ID
getIDGets node ID
setClassNameSets shape class name
getClassNameGets shape class name
showSets shape visible
hideSets shape invisible
setFillSets fill attributes.
getFillGets fill attributes
getFillOpacityGets fill opacity attribute
setStrokeSets stroke attributes.
setStrokeWidthSets stroke width attribute
setStrokeOpacitySets stroke opacity attribute
setStrokeColorSets stroke color attributes
getStrokeGets stroke attributes
getStrokeOpacityGets stroke opacity attribute
getStrokeWidthGets stroke width attribute
setAntialiasingSets antialiasing on or off
getAntialiasingGets antialiasing value
setBoundsSets shape bounds (it calls setSize and setLocation)
getBoundsGets object bounds
moveToFrontMoves this shape above all others
rotateRotates shape (by default rotation center = shape center)
translateTranslates shape
scaleScales shape
postTransformAdd a transformation “after” the current CTM
preTransformAdd a transformation “before” the current CTM
setMatrixSets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getMatrixGets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getInverseMatrixGets inverse CTM (current transformation matrix)
getRendererObjectGets renderer object link to this shape
Abstract FunctionsThose functions have to be overriden by any shapes.
getSizeGets object size
setSizeSets object size
getLocationGets object location
setLocationSets object location
Graphic.RectangleShape implementation of a rectangle.
Shape functionsShape
Specific Rectangle Functions
setRoundCornerSets round corners values in pixel
getRoundCornerGets round corners values in pixel
Graphic.EllipseShape implementation of an ellipse.
Graphic.CircleShape implementation of a circle.
Graphic.PolylineShape implementation of a Polyline.
Graphic.PolygonShape implementation of a polygon.
Graphic.LineShape implementation of a line.
Graphic.GroupShape implementation of a group.
Graphic.TextShape implementation of a text.
Graphic.ImageShape implementation of an image.
Specific Image Functions
setSourceSets image source
addObserverRegisters a new object as observer
removeObserverUnregisters an observer
sendSend a new message to all registered observers
activateActivates the current tool
unactivateUnactivates the current tool
clearClears the current tool
initDragCalled by tool manager to start a drag session (mouse down on a shape)
dragCalled by tool manager on mouse drag
endDragCalled by tool manager to end a drag session (mouse up on a shape)
mouseMoveCalled by tool manager on mouseMove (not called while draggin)
clickCalled by tool manager on a click
doubleClickCalled by tool manager on a double click
keyUpCalled by tool manager on a key up
keyDownCalled by tool manager on a key up
mouseOverCalled by tool manager on a mouse over
mouseOutCalled by tool manager on a mouse out
Graphic.ToolManagerClass to handle mouse event for any tools.

Class Methods

rendererSupported

rendererSupported: function(name)

Checks if a renderer is supported by the browser and by the framework

Parameters

namerenderer name (VML, SVG or Canvas)

Returns

true/false

Matrix

2D Matrix operation used for geometric transform of any shape.

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

License

MIT-style license.

Summary
Class Methods
multiplyMultiply 2 matrix
translateCreate a translation matrix
rotateCreate a rotate matrix
scaleCreate a scale matrix
rotateAtCreate a rotate matrix at a specific rotation center
scaleAtCreate a scale matrix at a specific center
invertInverts a matrix
Instance Methods
initializeConstructor.
mutliplyRightMultiply this matrix by another one to the right (this * matrix)
mutliplyLeftMultiply this matrix by another one to the left (matrix * this)
multiplyPointMultiply a point
multiplyBoundsMultiply a bound area (x, y, w, h)
valuesGets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy)
setValuesSets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy) with an array
hashValuesGets matrix values (xx, xy, yx, yy, dx, dy)

Class Methods

multiply

multiply: function(left,
right)

Multiply 2 matrix

Parameters

leftLeft matrix
rightRight matrix

Returns

A new matrix result of left multiply by right

translate

translate: function(x,
y)

Create a translation matrix

Parameters

xX translation value
yY translation value

Returns

A new matrix

rotate

rotate: function(angle)

Create a rotate matrix

Parameters

aangle in degree

Returns

A new matrix

scale

scale: function(sx,
sy)

Create a scale matrix

Parameters

sxx scale factor
syy scale factor (default sy = sx)

Returns

A new matrix

rotateAt

rotateAt: function(angle,
x,
y)

Create a rotate matrix at a specific rotation center

Parameters

aangle in degree
xX coordinate of rotation center
yY coordinate of rotation center Returns: A new matrix

scaleAt

scaleAt: function(sx,
sy,
x,
y)

Create a scale matrix at a specific center

Parameters

sxx scale factor
syy scale factor
xX coordinate of scale center
yY coordinate of scale center Returns: A new matrix

invert

invert: function(matrix)

Inverts a matrix

Parameters

matrixmatrix to invert

Returns

A new matrix

Instance Methods

initialize

initialize: function(values)

Constructor.  Creates a identity matrix by default

Parameters

valuesHash tables with matrix values: keys are xx, xy, yx, yy, dx, dy

Returns

A new matrix

mutliplyRight

Multiply this matrix by another one to the right (this * matrix)

Parameters

matrixRight matrix

Returns

this

mutliplyLeft

Multiply this matrix by another one to the left (matrix * this)

Parameters

matrixLeft matrix

Returns

this

multiplyPoint

multiplyPoint: function(x,
y)

Multiply a point

Parameters

xx coordinate
yy coordinate

Returns

{x:, y:}

TODO: unit test

multiplyBounds

multiplyBounds: function(bounds)

Multiply a bound area (x, y, w, h)

Parameters

boundshas table {x:, y:, w:, h:}

Returns

{x:, y:, w:, h:}

TODO: unit test

values

values: function()

Gets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy)

Returns

An array of 6 float values: xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy

setValues

setValues: function(array)

Sets matrix values (xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy) with an array

Parameters

array- An array of 6 float values: xx, yx, xy, yy, dx, dy

Returns

this

hashValues

hashValues: function()

Gets matrix values (xx, xy, yx, yy, dx, dy)

Returns

An hash table {xx: , xy: , yx: , yy: , dx: , dy: };

Graphic.AbstractRender

Abstract Renderer Class

This class should not be used directly, just as an new renderer parent class.

It lists all function that a renderer should implement.

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

Summary
initializeConstructor.
panPans current viewing.
zoomZooms current viewing.
getViewingGets current viewing.
setViewingSets current viewing.
setSizeSets current renderer size
getSizeGets current renderer size
destroyDestructor.
createShapeCreates a new shape.
addAdds a new shape to be displayed.
removeRemoves a shape from rendering
getGets a shape from an ID
shapesGets all shapes of the renderer
clearClears all shapes from rendering
updateAttributesUpdates shape attributes.
updateTransformUpdates shape transformation.
nbShapesGets nb shapes displayed in the renderer
showShows a shape.
hideHides a shape.
moveToFrontChanges shape z-index order to be display above all other shapes
moveToBackChanges shape z-index order to be display under all other shapes
drawPerforms shape rendering.
positionGets top-left renderer position
pickGets shape for a mouse event
Implemented Functions
initializeConstructor.
destroyDestructor.
getTypeGets node type ( = node name)
setIDSets shape ID
getIDGets node ID
setClassNameSets shape class name
getClassNameGets shape class name
showSets shape visible
hideSets shape invisible
setFillSets fill attributes.
getFillGets fill attributes
getFillOpacityGets fill opacity attribute
setStrokeSets stroke attributes.
setStrokeWidthSets stroke width attribute
setStrokeOpacitySets stroke opacity attribute
setStrokeColorSets stroke color attributes
getStrokeGets stroke attributes
getStrokeOpacityGets stroke opacity attribute
getStrokeWidthGets stroke width attribute
setAntialiasingSets antialiasing on or off
getAntialiasingGets antialiasing value
setBoundsSets shape bounds (it calls setSize and setLocation)
getBoundsGets object bounds
moveToFrontMoves this shape above all others
rotateRotates shape (by default rotation center = shape center)
translateTranslates shape
scaleScales shape
postTransformAdd a transformation “after” the current CTM
preTransformAdd a transformation “before” the current CTM
setMatrixSets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getMatrixGets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getInverseMatrixGets inverse CTM (current transformation matrix)

initialize

initialize: function(element)

Constructor.

Returns

A new renderer

pan

pan: function(x,
y)

Pans current viewing.

Parameters

xx shift value
yy shift value

Returns

this

zoom

zoom: function(sx,
sy,
cx,
cy)

Zooms current viewing.

Parameters

sxx scale value
syy scale value
cxx center (default renderer center)
cyy center (default renderer center)

Returns

this

getViewing

getViewing: function()

Gets current viewing.

Returns

An hash {tx:, ty:, sx:, sy:, cx:, cy:}

setViewing

setViewing: function(viewing)

Sets current viewing.

Parameters

An hash {tx:, ty:, sx:, sy:, cx:, cy:}

Returns

this

setSize

setSize: function(width,
height)

Sets current renderer size

Parameters

widthrenderer width
heightrenderer height

Returns

this

getSize

getSize: function()

Gets current renderer size

Returns

An hash {width:, height:}

destroy

destroy: function()

Destructor.  Should clean DOM and memory

createShape

createShape: function(type)

Creates a new shape.

Parameters

typeShape type (like rect, ellipse...)

Returns

A new object handling renderer information for drawing the shape

add

add: function(shape,
parent)

Adds a new shape to be displayed.  Parameters: shape - Shape object to be added parent - Parent Shape object for the added shape, used for grouping shapes. if null (default value) the shape is added as child of the renderer

See Also

Shape

remove

remove:function(shape,
parent)

Removes a shape from rendering

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object to be removed
parentParent Shape object for the removed shape, used when grouping shapes. if null (default value) the shape is removed as child of the renderer

See Also

Shape

get

get:function(id)

Gets a shape from an ID

Parameters

idshape id

Returns

A shape or null

See Also

Shape

shapes

shapes:function(id)

Gets all shapes of the renderer

Parameters

Returns

A array of shapes or null

See Also

Shape

clear

clear:function()

Clears all shapes from rendering

updateAttributes

updateAttributes:function(shape,
attributes)

Updates shape attributes.  Called when a shape has been modified like fill color or specific attributes like roundrect value

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

updateTransform

updateTransform:function(shape)

Updates shape transformation.  Called when a shape transformation has been modified like rotation, translation...

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

nbShapes

nbShapes: function()

Gets nb shapes displayed in the renderer

Returns

int value

See Also

Shape

show

show:function(shape)

Shows a shape.  The shape should have been added to the renderer before

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

hide

hide:function(shape)

Hides a shape.  The shape should have been added to the renderer before

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

moveToFront

moveToFront: function(shape)

Changes shape z-index order to be display above all other shapes

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

moveToBack

moveToBack: function(shape)

Changes shape z-index order to be display under all other shapes

Parameters

shapePrototype Grpahic Shape object

See Also

Shape

draw

draw: function()

Performs shape rendering.

position

position: function()

Gets top-left renderer position

Returns

An array of 2 values (x, y)

See Also

Shape

pick

pick: function(event)

Gets shape for a mouse event

Returns

null or first shape under mouse position

See Also

Shape

Implemented Functions

initialize

initialize: function(renderer,
nodeName)

Constructor.  Creates a new shape.

Parameters

rendererRenderer used to display this shape
nodeNameNode name (not linked to any renderer), like rect, ellipse ...

Returns

A new shape object

Destructor.

Node name string

Shape class name string

show: function()

Sets shape visible

Returns

this

hide

hide: function()

Sets shape invisible

Returns

this

setFill

setFill: function(attributes)

Sets fill attributes.  Currently it could be

  • null or attributes.fill == “none” for no filling
  • an hash of 4 keys {r:, g:, b:, a:}
  • a string : rgb(r,g,b,a)

Parameters

attributes: fill attributes (see above for details)

Returns

this

getFill

getFill: function()

Gets fill attributes

Returns

a string : rgb(r,g,b) or none

getFillOpacity

getFillOpacity: function()

Gets fill opacity attribute

Returns

a float [0..1]

setStroke

setStroke: function(attributes)

Sets stroke attributes.  Currently it could be

  • null or attributes.fill == “none” for no filling
  • an hash of 4 keys {r:, g:, b:, a:, w:} w is stroke width
  • a string : rgb(r,g,b,a, w)

Parameters

attributes: stroke attributes (see above for details)

Returns

this

setStrokeWidth

setStrokeWidth : function(w)

Sets stroke width attribute

Parameters

w: width in pixels

Returns

this

setStrokeOpacity

setStrokeOpacity : function(a)

Sets stroke opacity attribute

Parameters

a: opacity [0..255]

Returns

this

setStrokeColor

setStrokeColor : function(r,
g,
b)

Sets stroke color attributes

Parameters

r: red [0..255] g: green [0..255] b: blue [0..255]

Returns

this

getStroke

getStroke: function()

Gets stroke attributes

Returns

a string : rgb(r,g,b) or none

getStrokeOpacity

getStrokeOpacity: function()

Gets stroke opacity attribute

Returns

a float [0..1]

getStrokeWidth

getStrokeWidth: function()

Gets stroke width attribute

Returns

a float

setAntialiasing

setAntialiasing: function(on)

Sets antialiasing on or off

Parameters

onboolean, true for activating antialiasing

Returns

this

getAntialiasing

getAntialiasing: function()

Gets antialiasing value

Returns

true/false

y,
w,
h)

Sets shape bounds (it calls setSize and setLocation)

Parameters

xshape X corner
yshape Y corner
wshape width
hshape height

Returns

this

rotate: function(angle,
rx,
ry)

Rotates shape (by default rotation center = shape center)

Parameters

angleAngle in degree
rxrotation center X value (default shape center)
ryrotation center Y value (default shape center)

Returns

this

translate: function(tx,
ty)

Translates shape

Parameters

txX value
tyY value

Returns

this

scale

scale: function(sx,
sy,
cx,
cy)

Scales shape

Parameters

sxsx scale factor
sysy scale factor
cyscale center X value (default current CTM center)
cyscale center Y value (default current CTM center) Returns: this

Graphic.Rectangle

Shape implementation of a rectangle.  A Rectangle can have rounded corners

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

License

MIT-style license.

Summary
Shape functionsShape
Specific Rectangle Functions
setRoundCornerSets round corners values in pixel
getRoundCornerGets round corners values in pixel

Shape functions

See Also

Shape

Specific Rectangle Functions

ry)

Sets round corners values in pixel

Parameters

rxround X value
ryround Y value

Returns

this

getRoundCorner

getRoundCorner: function(rx,
ry)

Gets round corners values in pixel

Returns

An hash table {rx:, ry:}

Graphic.Image

Shape implementation of an image.

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

License

MIT-style license.

Summary
Specific Image Functions
setSourceSets image source
addObserverRegisters a new object as observer
removeObserverUnregisters an observer
sendSend a new message to all registered observers
activateActivates the current tool
unactivateUnactivates the current tool
clearClears the current tool
initDragCalled by tool manager to start a drag session (mouse down on a shape)
dragCalled by tool manager on mouse drag
endDragCalled by tool manager to end a drag session (mouse up on a shape)
mouseMoveCalled by tool manager on mouseMove (not called while draggin)
clickCalled by tool manager on a click
doubleClickCalled by tool manager on a double click
keyUpCalled by tool manager on a key up
keyDownCalled by tool manager on a key up
mouseOverCalled by tool manager on a mouse over
mouseOutCalled by tool manager on a mouse out

Specific Image Functions

setSource

setSource: function(url,
autoSize)

Sets image source

Parameters

urlimage url
autoSizeSet width and height from image (default false)

Returns

this

addObserver

addObserver: function(observer,
sender)

Registers a new object as observer

Parameters

observerObserver (should implement message function to be notified)
senderSender object (default:null) If not null, observer will only received message from this object

removeObserver

removeObserver: function(observer)

Unregisters an observer

Parameters

observerObserver

send

send: function(sender,
eventName,
options)

Send a new message to all registered observers

Parameters

senderSender object (can be null)
eventNameEvent name (observers have to implement this method)
optionsObject or Hash table (for multiple options) of sending event (default null)

activate

activate: function(manager)

Activates the current tool

Parameters

managertool manager

unactivate

unactivate: function(manager)

Unactivates the current tool

Parameters

managertool manager

clear

clear: function(manager)

Clears the current tool

Parameters

managertool manager

initDrag

initDrag: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager to start a drag session (mouse down on a shape)

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

drag

drag: function(x,
y,
dx,
dy,
ddx,
ddy,
event)

Called by tool manager on mouse drag

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
dxx delta since the init drag
dxy delta since the init drag
ddxx delta since the last drag
ddxy delta since the last drag
eventbrowser mouse event

endDrag

endDrag: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager to end a drag session (mouse up on a shape)

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

mouseMove

mouseMove: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager on mouseMove (not called while draggin)

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

click

click: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager on a click

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

doubleClick

doubleClick: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager on a double click

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

keyUp

keyUp: function(keyCode,
event)

Called by tool manager on a key up

Parameters

keyCodekey code
eventbrowser key event

Returns

true if tool handle key, else false

keyDown

keyDown: function(keyCode,
event)

Called by tool manager on a key up

Parameters

keyCodekey code
eventbrowser key event

Returns

true if tool handle key, else false

mouseOver

mouseOver: function(x,
y,
event)

Called by tool manager on a mouse over

Parameters

xx mouse coordinate in current area
yy mouse coordinate in current area
eventbrowser mouse event

mouseOut

mouseOut: function(event)

Called by tool manager on a mouse out

Parameters

eventbrowser mouse event

Graphic.ToolManager

Class to handle mouse event for any tools.  Just initialize a tool manager on a renderer and set your a tool (setTool)

Author

Sébastien Gruhier, http://www.xilinus.com

License

MIT-style license.

See Also

Tool

Checks if a renderer is supported by the browser and by the framework

right)

getSize: function()
Gets current renderer size
destroy: function()
Destructor.
createShape: function(type)
Creates a new shape.
add: function(shape,
parent)
Adds a new shape to be displayed.
remove:function(shape,
parent)
Removes a shape from rendering
get:function(id)
Gets a shape from an ID
shapes:function(id)
Gets all shapes of the renderer
clear:function()
Clears all shapes from rendering
updateAttributes:function(shape,
attributes)
Updates shape attributes.
updateTransform:function(shape)
Updates shape transformation.
nbShapes: function()
Gets nb shapes displayed in the renderer
show:function(shape)
Shows a shape.
hide:function(shape)
Hides a shape.
moveToFront: function(shape)
Changes shape z-index order to be display above all other shapes
moveToBack: function(shape)
Changes shape z-index order to be display under all other shapes
draw: function()
Performs shape rendering.
position: function()
Gets top-left renderer position
pick: function(event)
Gets shape for a mouse event
getType: function()
Gets node type ( = node name)
setID: function(id)
Sets shape ID
getID: function()
Gets node ID
setClassName: function(className)
Sets shape class name
getClassName: function()
Gets shape class name
setFill: function(attributes)
Sets fill attributes.
getFill: function()
Gets fill attributes
getFillOpacity: function()
Gets fill opacity attribute
setStroke: function(attributes)
Sets stroke attributes.
setStrokeWidth : function(w)
Sets stroke width attribute
setStrokeOpacity : function(a)
Sets stroke opacity attribute
setStrokeColor : function(r,
g,
b)
Sets stroke color attributes
getStroke: function()
Gets stroke attributes
getStrokeOpacity: function()
Gets stroke opacity attribute
getStrokeWidth: function()
Gets stroke width attribute
setAntialiasing: function(on)
Sets antialiasing on or off
getAntialiasing: function()
Gets antialiasing value
setBounds: function(x,
y,
w,
h)
Sets shape bounds (it calls setSize and setLocation)
getBounds: function()
Gets object bounds
rotate: function(angle,
rx,
ry)
Rotates shape (by default rotation center = shape center)
translate: function(tx,
ty)
Translates shape
scale: function(sx,
sy,
cx,
cy)
Scales shape
postTransform: function(matrix)
Add a transformation “after” the current CTM
preTransform: function(matrix)
Add a transformation “before” the current CTM
setMatrix: function(matrix,
inverse)
Sets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getMatrix: function()
Gets CTM (current transformation matrix)
getInverseMatrix: function()
Gets inverse CTM (current transformation matrix)
getRendererObject: function()
Gets renderer object link to this shape
getLocation: function()
Gets object location
setLocation: function(x,
y)
Sets object location
Abstract class for vectorial shapes.
setRoundCorner: function(rx,
ry)
Sets round corners values in pixel
getRoundCorner: function(rx,
ry)
Gets round corners values in pixel
setSource: function(url,
autoSize)
Sets image source
addObserver: function(observer,
sender)
Registers a new object as observer
removeObserver: function(observer)
Unregisters an observer
send: function(sender,
eventName,
options)
Send a new message to all registered observers
activate: function(manager)
Activates the current tool
unactivate: function(manager)
Unactivates the current tool
clear: function(manager)
Clears the current tool
initDrag: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager to start a drag session (mouse down on a shape)
drag: function(x,
y,
dx,
dy,
ddx,
ddy,
event)
Called by tool manager on mouse drag
endDrag: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager to end a drag session (mouse up on a shape)
mouseMove: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager on mouseMove (not called while draggin)
click: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager on a click
doubleClick: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager on a double click
keyUp: function(keyCode,
event)
Called by tool manager on a key up
keyDown: function(keyCode,
event)
Called by tool manager on a key up
mouseOver: function(x,
y,
event)
Called by tool manager on a mouse over
mouseOut: function(event)
Called by tool manager on a mouse out
Abstract class used by Graphic.ToolManager.
